personalInfo.name: Krupal Virani
personalInfo.title: Maker & Computer Science Student
personalInfo.bio: A passionate maker and computer science enthusiast exploring the intersection of hardware and software. Currently working on innovative projects combining physical computing with software solutions.

projects.title: Gyro Pen
projects.description: An innovative pen design incorporating gyroscopic technology for enhanced stability and precision in writing and drawing.

projects.title: Volumetric Display
projects.description: Creating three-dimensional visual displays in space using advanced optics and mechanical systems for immersive data visualization.

projects.title: Ramsey's Theorem Visualizer
projects.description: Interactive graph visualization tool for exploring Ramsey's theorem, built with Rust and Three.js for high-performance rendering.
